VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Path of the Swift Winds
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Movement speed is increased by +0.15.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The people of {0} revere the winds that guide their every step, believing swift movement is a sign of favor.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Cult of Inner Strength
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: People are more resilient and their mental break threshold is decreased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The inhabitants of {0} are taught from a young age to cultivate mental resilience, believing in the strength of the mind.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Whisperers of the Mind
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Psychic sensitivity is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0}'s inhabitants believe in unlocking the mysteries of the mind, making them susceptible to psychic forces.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Breath of the Ancients
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Toxic resistance is increased by 0.3
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The lineage of {0} claims they inherit the resistance from their ancestors, capable of withstanding toxic environments.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Lorekeepers' Tradition
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Learning rate of all skills is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every child in {0} is taught the value of knowledge, ensuring a society of quick learners.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Embrace of the Night
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Rest while sleeping is gained 10% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Nighttime in {0} is considered a sacred period of rest and rejuvenation.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Ritual of Quick Feast
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Eating speed is 25% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: In {0}, meals are a swift affair, symbolizing the need to make the most of every moment.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Walkers in Cold Shadows
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Comfortable minimum temperature is 5 degrees lower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: To the people of {0}, enduring cold is a testament to their hardiness.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Children of the Scorching Sun
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Comfortable maximum temperature is 5 degrees higher.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The sun-baked lands of {0} have shaped its people, making them thrive in the heat.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Followers of the Healing Waters
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Immunity to diseases is gained 10% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Healing springs are revered in {0}, believed to grant faster recovery from ailments.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Order of the Mending Hands
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Injuries are healed 10% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0} holds a tradition of skilled healers, accelerating the recovery of injuries.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Creed of the Stoic
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Pain threshold, at which colonists go unconscious due to pain, is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Pain is seen as a teacher in {0}, and its inhabitants have a higher tolerance because of this belief.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Nomads of Abundance
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Travellers forage additional 0.3 nutrition per day.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The nomadic traditions of {0} have honed their foraging skills, ensuring no traveler goes hungry.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Disciples of Cleanliness
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Filth produced by people is reduced by 25%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Purity and cleanliness are virtues held in high regard by {0}.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Way of the Rested Spirit
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Need to rest depletes 10% slower.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0} believes in conserving energy, allowing them to be ever ready for the challenges ahead.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Diplomats of Silver Tongue
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Colonists are 10% better at negotiating.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Words are a powerful tool for the people of {0}, making them masterful negotiators.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Protectors of Order
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chance to successfully arrest someone is increased by 15%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0} has a reputation for its skilled enforcers, ensuring peace by swiftly apprehending troublemakers.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Merchants of Prosperity
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Trade prices are improved by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The marketplace of {0} is renowned for its fair and advantageous trade deals.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Charismatic Enclave
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Social impact of all colonists is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every citizen of {0} is raised with the virtues of empathy and charisma, enhancing their social prowess.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Whisperers to the Wild
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: A chance to tame animals is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The age-old bond between {0} and animals enables its people to tame the wild with ease.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Guild of Diligence
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Global work speed is increased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: "Time is gold," a mantra etched deep within the ethos of {0}, driving them to work efficiently.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Devoted Miners
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Mining speed is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The landscape of {0} has trained its miners to extract resources swiftly and proficiently.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Seekers of Hidden Depths
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Deep drilling speed is increased by 15%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Driven by the promise of riches beneath, {0}'s drillers penetrate the rock at unparalleled speeds.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Stewards of the Vein
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The resource yield of mining jobs is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every strike in {0}'s mines promises a bountiful reward, thanks to their efficient extraction techniques.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Scholars of Progress
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Research speed is increased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The academic tradition of {0} is unmatched, pushing boundaries with accelerated research.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Keepers of the Pasture
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The yield of resources obtained from animal handling is increased by 15%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The bond between {0} and their livestock ensures that they reap the most from their herds.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Sowers of Abundance
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Plant work speed is increased by 15%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Through careful nurturing, the farmers of {0} tend to their crops with unparalleled expertise.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Harvesters of Bounty
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The resource yield of plant jobs is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The fertile lands of {0} yield more under the hands of its skilled cultivators.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Shadows of the Hunt
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Hunting stealth is increased by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The hunters of {0} move silently, becoming one with nature to claim their prey.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Masons of the Future
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The speed of construction work is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Structures rise swiftly in {0}, a testament to the craftsmanship of its builders.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Custodians of Purity
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Cleaning speed is increased by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Cleanliness is next to godliness for the people of {0}, who believe in swift and efficient sanitation.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Healers of Swift Hand
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical tend speed is increased by 10%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The medical artisans of {0} are renowned for their swift treatments, ensuring minimal suffering.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Physicians of Precision
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical tend quality is improved by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Through years of dedication, {0}'s medical practitioners have honed their craft to near perfection.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Surgeons of Excellence
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Medical operation speed is 15% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The surgical theatres of {0} are a sight to behold, with operations being completed at remarkable speeds.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Warriors of Precision
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chance to hit a melee attack is improved by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0}'s warriors have the prowess to strike with unmatched accuracy in close combat.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Dancers of the Battlefield
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chance to dodge a melee attack is improved by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The soldiers of {0} weave through combat with grace, effortlessly dodging enemy blows.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Marksmen
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Shooting accuracy is increased by 5%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Drawing inspiration from ancient archers, {0}'s shooters rarely miss their mark.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Quickdraw Masters
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Aiming a ranged weapon takes 10% less time.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: In the heart of {0}, aiming swiftly and shooting is considered both an art and a vital survival skill.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Mortar Visionaries
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Mortars fired by the colonists are 15% more accurate.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0}'s mortar teams boast unrivaled accuracy, bringing devastation upon their foes.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Diligent Doers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The speed of unskilled labor tasks is 10% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every task, no matter how mundane, is approached with zeal and efficiency in {0}.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Chemists of Efficacy
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: The speed of drug synthesis is 15% faster.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: {0}'s drug synthesizers work at a blistering pace, ensuring medicines and drugs are always available.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Culinary Connoisseurs
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Chances of causing food poisoning are reduced by 20%.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: The kitchens of {0} take utmost care in food preparation, ensuring their meals are both delicious and safe.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Tech Scavengers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Yield of resources obtained from shredding mechanoids is 20% higher.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: With adept hands and discerning eyes, {0} makes the most out of every defeated mechanoid.

VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.label: Master Butchers
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.description: Yield of resources obtained from butchering creatures is 10% higher.
VFETribals.CornerstoneDef.blurb: Every creature is honored in death, with {0} ensuring nothing goes to waste.
